subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Banks, known for his sunny mantra, “Let’s play two,” hit 512 home runs in 19 seasons and won consecutive M.V.P. awards, but he never reached the postseason.
snippet: Banks, known for his sunny mantra, “Let’s play two,” hit 512 home runs in 19 seasons and won consecutive M.V.P. awards, but he never reached the postseason.
